bug.author: pmbaumgartner
bug.summary: Base config includes reference to unavailable en_vectors_web_lg (spacy-nightly)
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
With spacy-nightly installed: <denchmark-code>python -m spacy init config base.cfg --optimize=accuracy --cpu python -m spacy init fill-config base.cfg config.cfg python -m spacy download en_vectors_web_lg </denchmark-code>
returns: <denchmark-code>Collecting en_vectors_web_lg==3.0.0a0 ERROR: HTTP error 404 while getting https://github.com/explosion/spacy-models/releases/download/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0.tar.gz#egg=en_vectors_web_lg==3.0.0a0 ERROR: Could not install requirement en_vectors_web_lg==3.0.0a0 from https://github.com/explosion/spacy-models/releases/download/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0.tar.gz#egg=en_vectors_web_lg==3.0.0a0 because of HTTP error 404 Client Error: Not Found for url: https://github.com/explosion/spacy-models/releases/download/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0.tar.gz for URL https://github.com/explosion/spacy-models/releases/download/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0/en_vectors_web_lg-3.0.0a0.tar.gz#egg=en_vectors_web_lg==3.0.0a0 </denchmark-code>
in config.cfg the line is: <denchmark-code>[initialize] vectors = "en_vectors_web_lg" </denchmark-code>
Assuming this will be fixed once 3.0 is final, but wanted to highlight for others who might be using nightly and expecting the config to work out of the box. <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
spaCy version: 3.0.0rc1 Platform: macOS-10.14.6-x86_64-i386-64bit Python version: 3.8.6 Pipelines: en_core_web_lg (3.0.0a0), en_core_web_trf (3.0.0a0)

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback! We should switch the vector recommends to the core_lg models.
